title: Understanding the Concept
text: The average satisfaction score is a summary measure derived from a sample of customers. It represents a characteristic of the sample.

title: Defining Terms
text: A statistic is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. In this case, the average satisfaction score is calculated from the sample of $$50$$ customers.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: What is the term for a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample?
